Welcome to The Tile Art, where innovation meets artistry. Explore our premium range of tiles designed to elevate every room with timeless elegance, durability, and trendsetting aesthetics.

Whether you're reimagining your kitchen backsplash, creating a custom bathroom design, or upgrading high-traffic spaces, our tiles are crafted to inspire.

JRM Vinyl Marble

Elevate your home with the opulence of marble, now available in a durable, easy-to-install vinyl option. The JRM Vinyl Marble tiles combine the luxurious look of polished stone with the resilience of vinyl, making them perfect for high-traffic areas or moisture-prone spaces like bathrooms and kitchens.

Key Features:

  • Scratch-resistant and waterproof
  • Low-maintenance with a high-gloss finish
  • Ideal for modern or classic interiors

Perfect For:

Sleek bathroom designs
Sophisticated kitchen backsplashes
High-traffic floors in living or commercial spaces

"The JRM Vinyl Marble tiles gave my kitchen a high-end look without the high-end price. I couldn't be happier!"

– Amelia T., Satisfied Customer

Shop JRM Vinyl Marble
Premium Quality
Certified & Tested

Jig-Tik Tiles

Add a touch of creativity to your spaces with our Jig-Tik tiles. These versatile tiles are perfect for custom designs, allowing you to showcase your unique style. Whether you're creating a mosaic backsplash or a feature wall, Jig-Tik tiles deliver endless possibilities.

Key Features:

  • Customizable patterns and layouts
  • Vibrant colors and finishes
  • Made from eco-friendly materials

Perfect For:

Eye-catching kitchen backsplash tiles
Statement walls in living rooms
Unique designs for bathrooms and entrances

"I loved how easy it was to create a custom pattern with the Jig-Tik tiles. My guests are always impressed!"

– Raj P., Homeowner

Shop Jig-Tik Tiles
Premium Quality
Certified & Tested

Black Tail Tiles

Sleek, bold, and modern, our Black Tail tiles are designed for those who want to make a statement. These tiles feature a matte black finish that adds depth and drama to any room.

Key Features:

  • Slip-resistant and durable
  • Heat-resistant for kitchen applications
  • Delivers a contemporary, luxurious appeal

Perfect For:

Bold bathroom accents
Stylish kitchen backsplashes
Sophisticated commercial spaces

"The matte black finish of the Black Tail tiles transformed my bathroom into a modern haven. Highly recommend!"

– Marcus L., Designer

Shop Black Tail Tiles

Why Choose The Tile Art?

At The Tile Art, we are committed to delivering tiles that are as functional as they are beautiful. Here's what sets us apart:

Unmatched Quality

Our tiles are made with premium materials to ensure long-lasting performance.

Innovative Designs

From marble-inspired luxury to vibrant custom patterns, our collection brings your vision to life.

Customer-Centric Approach

Your satisfaction is our priority. We offer tailored solutions for custom tile designs to meet your exact needs.

Eco-Friendly Practices

Sustainability is embedded in everything we do, from sourcing materials to manufacturing.

Our Complete Collection

Discover premium tiles that combine beauty with durability. Explore endless design possibilities with our innovative range.
